actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to revise the special pay provisions for certain health professionals in the uniformed services.
short_title: Uniformed Services Health Professionals Special Pay Act of 1979

summary.text: Uniformed Services Health Professionals Special Pay Act of 1979 - Revises the special pay for medical officers, dental officers, veterinary officers, and optometry officers in the uniformed services on active duty.

titles.title: Uniformed Services Health Professionals Special Pay Act of 1979
A bill to amend chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, to revise the special pay provisions for certain health professionals in the uniformed services.
